label: A4B3_cI112_230_af_g-001
title: Ga$_{4}$Ni$_{3}$ Structure
comments: This is a simple defect superstructure of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cP2_221_a_b-002}{CsCl ($B2$) structure}. If GaNi $B2$ is expanded into a 128 atom supercell, we can describe it using space group $Ia\overline{3}d$ \#230, with Ga atoms on the (16a) and (48f) Wyckoff sites and Ni atoms on the (16b) and (48g) sites. Removing the Ni atoms from the (16b) sites yields this structure.
